Reviews.Title: Camera package is great
Reviews.Author: Jonny
Reviews.Content: Camera package is great! Does everything expected of it.  Bag is to small for all the extra stuff that you get, but everything you get is something that I use.  Really like the options of ways to watch your videos.  Couldn't be happier.  Can watch video from phone, computer or tv using the included cables or hdmi memory card reader.

Reviews.Title: Incomplete orders.
Reviews.Author: serkan arkoc
Reviews.Content: WHEN you have the missing pieces in order.Therefore, I'm not happy.Package which appears in Sony VCTGM1 Headband and Clip-on Kit for Sony Waterproof Housing + Handlebar Mount VCTHM1 these two products did not come from the package.In addition, the seller did not refund the cost of these products. I think I cheated and therefore sue these cases.I want my soon this product or I want a refund.

ProductInfo.Features:
Wide Angle Carl Zeiss Vario-Tessar Lens
Full HD 1920 x 1080p Video at 60 fps, Capture 12MP Still Images in Photo Mode
Back-Illuminated Exmor R CMOS Sensor, Built-In Wi-Fi & GPS
HDMI Output & Stereo Microphone Input
Full HD 1920 x 1080p Video at 60 fps
ProductInfo.Name: Sony High Definition POV Action Video Camera HDR-AS30V + 32GB MicroSDHC Class 10 Memory Card + Sony VCTGM1 Headband and Clip-on Kit for Waterproof Housing + Sony VCTHM1 Handlebar Mount + NP-BX1 Lion Battery + HDMI Cable + Carrying Case + External Rapid Charger + Table Top Tripod, Lens Cleaning Kit, LCD Protector + USB SDHC Reader + Memory Wallet
